alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Assumption; Lafourche; Livingston; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 24 at 4:17PM CST until January 24 at 7:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... East Central Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern Assumption Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Lafourche Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southern Livingston Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern St. Charles Parish in southeastern Louisiana... St. James Parish in southeastern Louisiana... St. John The Baptist Parish in southeastern Louisiana... North Central Terrebonne Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 700 PM CST. * At 417 PM CST, emergency management and broadcast media reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain with water approaching homes in Thidodaux and commercial buildings in Laplace. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Thibodaux, Reserve, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Chackbay, South Vacherie, North Vacherie, Convent, Wallace, Schriever, Labadieville, Raceland, Gray, Supreme, Garyville, Edgard, Bayou Cane, Killona and Montz. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 188 and 212. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 6. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; Assumption; Lafourche; Livingston; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Terrebonne
